title: DNA Sisters Suffragettes
description: DNA testing reveals Amy has a new Sister and soon to be Best Friend. Amy's favorite Aunt was a Suffragette, so, it was decided they must travel back in time to 1913 so they could march in The Suffrage Parade with her. Amy and Alex arrive in Washington D.C. and lend some non DNA Sisters a helping hand in the struggle for Equality.Many of the Names and Faces will be familiar to Woman Suffrage Aficionados, some will be ever so Charmingly new; explore the world of 'Votes for Women' with a fun Romp to and through Washington D.C. and the Suffrage Parade of 1913.The Cover has changed on this new edition- and is available Prime through Amazon.Written in the USA-Printed in the USA!
author: Wendy Kolar Mullen
